item.title: Great use case for flexdashboard
item.description: Found this blog post from Jennifer Thompson today, thanks to the flurry of great content being shared on Twitter during #rstudioconf. Iâ€™ve already been asked to help put together monitoring tools for human cohorts before and no doubt will be in the future. This will no doubt come in handy!
